Summary: Two white objects, one shoots off at 90 degrees
divs: sighting details we were at my sister's house- in her back yard which faces north and is located on a golf course in doral- close to mia. sheri and i were helping my brother in law move his new hammock to the middle of the backyard on the grass. the hammock was positioned north to south. sheri wanted to try the hammock and proceeded to lay on it- feet pointing north. she gazed up- to notice how fast the sparse clouds were moving. then, a little to the north, she noticed a group of small lights at a very high altitude- traveling from north to south. she pointed up to show me and i saw them immediately. i saw the objects and, at first, told her that it was all a trick of the eye and that those were stars that appeared to be moving because of the fast pace in which the clouds were passing overhead. it seemed too obvious to me that the objects were moving against the cloud direction. well, i kept on looking and sure enough, 2 of the objects started to move even faster towards the south pulling away from the others. the 2 objects were then directly over us side by side east\west. then in an instant, the object on the right\east ��� shot off 90 degrees to the east leaving a streak of light that lasted a second. the other object then sped up to the south and disappeared. i called you afterwards. i also remember during the sighting- i had said out loud that the lights reminded me of the mexico lights.
